features.title: Store and Chat with your PDFs & documents
features.description: Store your documents and chat with them in real-time. Supported file types: PDF, TXT, MD, JSON, RTF. Ask questions, perform data analysis, edit your documents, and more.

features.title: Chat with and analyze entire code repositories
features.description: Chat with your code repositories. Find bugs, get code improvements, write tests, and more.

features.title: Code Search
features.description: Search your code repositories. Find the code you need with a simple search.

features.title: Document Management
features.description: Manage your documents and code repositories in one place. Easily search, filter, and sort your documents.

features.title: Export your chats to multiple formats.
features.description: Export your chats to multiple formats. You can export your chats to a PDF, CSV or a JSON file.

features.title: Responsive Across Devices
features.description: View your documents on any device, anywhere, with a user friendly interface.
